name: Repacket
headline: Secure-by-default web browsing for your employees.
description:
90% of security breaches are caused by a simple employee mistake. 

Your employee clicks a bad link, and gives up their password. They download a virus and run it. They leak your source code and PHI to ChatGPT.

Repacket allows your employees to enjoy the internet without risk - instantly blocking threats like data leaks and phishing using content inspection and AI. This gives your employees the ability to make that mistake without impacting your company.

Founded by cybersecurity leaders from SpaceX, AWS, and Google - we're building security tools that solve the biggest problems, without headaches for your employees.

founders.name: Noah Stanford, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ repacket.com (previously 0pass.com) | Most recently, I created and led the security team for AWS Cognito. Previously, I created and led the Identity and Authentication team at SpaceX.

# Secure employee activity, without limiting productivity
Say Goodbye to:
Phishing Links
Unsafe Content
Data Leaks
Shadow AI
Repacket is the simplest and fastest way for teams everywhere to ensure a secure-by-default endpoint experience across approved and unapproved business products.
[Early Access](https://repacket.com/<#early-access>)[Schedule a Demo](https://repacket.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67a307733474b2c02728cedb_pop-up.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67a3079933509650a2aec8fe_Alerts%20\(2\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67a3098e157f16b6f5711592_Group%2027188%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67a307ce2f6928fef983de4b_Group%2027187%20\(1\).png)
## Repacket is built for teams of all sizes and maturities
### [Small BusinessYou have newfound security needs or concerns and need the essentials.Learn More](https://repacket.com/</for/new-to-security>)### [IT Team of OneYou may be the one IT person staffed with all the security requirements.Learn More](https://repacket.com/</for/small-it-team>)### [Mid-Size OrgYou have a security team in place or at least an MSP/MSSP helping out.Learn More](https://repacket.com/</for/security-team>)### [EnterpriseYou have a multi-team security department with complex requirements and priorities.Learn More](https://repacket.com/</for/enterprise>)
## Network Controlled, Work Secured 
Repacket is how modern teams instantly remove the majority of cybersecurity threats by default.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67947988a5d4e9499eba7956_Exception%20Requests.png)
### Completely Neutralize Phishing Links
Repacket uses multiple levels of classification in real-time to immediately block phishing attacks from working.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67a2f4da4f8fc5c19f0df751_Alerts_empty.png)
### Filter Unsafe Content
Prevent bad content from ever loading on employee devices and protect your team.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/67947ba29097b95860ec15bc_Devices%20_%20Empty.png)
### One Click Install
Whether you're in a managed environment or BYOD, Repacket's setup process takes minutes to start protecting your organization and users.
### Prevent Sensitive Data Leaks
Prevent sensitive data exposure to external services like ChatGPT, Slack, email, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Known phishing domains
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
AI/ML training platforms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Unapproved cloud services
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
File hosting websites
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Apps like Slack, Discord, etc
### Control Shadow IT and AI Usage
Don't just write computer policies, enforce them. Detect rogue usage and steer users toward approved platforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Detect unapproved cloud and third-party app usage
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Steer users towards approved platforms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Measure team productivity
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Fine-grained AI access controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6793e21cbf750f00f470df62/679fb8067c70ae782fcc2c83_hero%20divider.svg)
Personal account restrictions
## Proactively protect your sensitive data with detection and masking
[PII](https://repacket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[PHI](https://repacket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[PCI](https://repacket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Repacket**

**Website:** [Repacket](https://repacket.com)  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Group Partner:** Harj Taggar

### Mission
Repacket’s guiding philosophy is to create a "Secure-by-default" web browsing experience for employees. Designed to mitigate the risk of security breaches—after all, studies show that 90% of breaches are initiated by employee errors—Repacket aims to allow employees to navigate the internet without fear.

### The Problem
When an employee accidentally clicks a malicious link, their organization can suffer severe consequences, including leaked sensitive information or compromised systems. Repacket recognizes that human error can lead to catastrophic results, from phishing attacks to data leaks.

### The Solution
Repacket’s platform intelligently blocks threats in real-time through advanced content inspection and AI technologies. The tool empowers employees to make online mistakes—like clicking bad links—without jeopardizing the security of the entire organization.

### Key Features
- **Phishing Prevention:** Instantly neutralizes phishing links.
- **Data Protection:** Prevents sensitive information leaks to unauthorized platforms like AI applications or social media.
- **Content Filtering:** Controls web access in real time to ensure safe browsing practices.
- **Governance of AI Usage:** Monitors and promotes compliance with acceptable AI tools for work.
- **One-Click Installation:** Setup is quick, accommodating both managed and BYOD environments.

### Ideal For
Repacket caters to organizations of all shapes and sizes:
- **Small Businesses** looking to establish essential security foundations.
- **IT Teams of One** needing streamlined security controls.
- **Mid-Sized Organizations** with established security teams to enhance their existing protocols.
- **Enterprises** facing complex security challenges across multiple departments.

### The Way Forward
The company is currently in early access and encourages organizations to sign up for features that include data loss prevention, content filtering, and session protections. Interested parties can schedule a demo through their website to see how Repacket can seamlessly integrate into their workflow, enhancing security without stifling productivity.

In conclusion, Repacket's innovative approach positions it as a leader in enabling secure and productive web environments, reducing the burden of inevitable human errors within the digital workspace.
